text: Barbara Grocholska (born 24 August 1927) is a Polish alpine skier. She competed at the 1952 Winter Olympics and the 1956 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:Living people Category:Polish female alpine skiers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of Poland Category:Alpine skiers at the 1952 Winter Olympics Category:Alpine skiers at the 1956 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Warsaw
title: Barbara Grocholska
